channel.title: Gfx at coord? PI
channel.description:
I cnt seem to find any way to make a gfx spawn at a selected location :/
What method do i need for this? I have been searching on google for a while

item.title: Gfx at coord? PI
item.dc:creator: @Quintorz Quintorz
item.description:
@Quintorz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:547906”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=666812.msg4458524#msg4458524 date=1416270697]
its a packet, should have it in your source. keep in mind that if you want everyone to be able to see the graphic you’ll have to send it for all local players
[/quote]

^This…
PI, luckily, already has a method for that. It’s called stillGfx and can be found in the PlayerAssistant class.

// For the single player

// For everyone.

Thanks bro… i found the stillGfx method before i saw u posted this. and had to make it c2.stillgfx(***********); lol

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx at coord? PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lare69:

its a packet, should have it in your source. keep in mind that if you want everyone to be able to see the graphic you’ll have to send it for all local players

^This…
PI, luckily, already has a method for that. It’s called stillGfx and can be found in the PlayerAssistant class.

// For the single player

// For everyone.
